verses.roman:
yāha tumi, tomāra jyeṭhāre milāha āmāre
ye-mate bhāla haya karuna, bhāra diluṅ tāṅre

synonyms: yāha—go; tumi—you; tomāra—your; jyeṭhāre—the elder brother of your father; milāha āmāre—arrange to meet with me; ye-mate—in whatever way; bhāla—good; haya—is; karuna—let him do; bhāra diluṅ tāṅre—I shall completely depend upon him.
translation: "Now you go arrange a meeting between me and your uncle. Let him do whatever he thinks best. I shall completely depend on his decision."
